title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions: Introducing the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, the ultimate combination of comfort and style! This full coverage, wirefree plus-size bra is perfect for everyday wear, with sizes ranging from 32C to 50DD. The adjustable front straps ensure a perfect fit, while the luxurious leopard satin adds a touch of glamour. Made from a blend of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, this pack includes 1 satin bra in a variety of stylish colors, including leopard print, white, nude, and more. With features like wide band support and hook and eye closures, this bra pack offers the perfect blend of support and style. Say goodbye to uncomfortable underwires and hello to the perfect wireless bra pack for all-day comfort and confidence. Treat yourself to the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack today!
